sentence.text: This study aimed to evaluate the interactions between single nucleotide polymorphisms of response to oxidative stress (rs1917799) and protein polyubiquitination (rs158572 and rs158916) in gastric cancer and its precancerous diseases.

In situ response to oxidative stress and protein polyubiquitination protein expression were detected by immunohistochemistry in 109 chronic superficial gastritis, 109 chronic atrophic gastritis and 109 gastric cancer cases.

Our results demonstrated pairwise epistatic interactions between response to oxidative stress and protein polyubiquitination SNPs that ERCC6 rs1917799-ERCC8 rs158572 combination was associated with decreased risk of chronic atrophic gastritis and increased risk of gastric cancer.
response to oxidative stress rs1917799 also showed a significant interaction with protein polyubiquitination rs158916 to reduce gastric cancer risk.

The expressions of response to oxidative stress, protein polyubiquitination and ERCC6-ERCC8 combination have similarities that higher positivity was observed in chronic superficial gastritis compared with chronic atrophic gastritis and gastric cancer.

In conclusion, response to oxidative stress rs1917799, protein polyubiquitination rs158572 and rs158916 demonstrated pairwise epistatic interactions to associate with chronic atrophic gastritis and gastric cancer risk.
